column1: - transparent : pass dhcp option 82 transparently if sent by
- add-or-replace : add dhcp option 82 if not present or
replace the dhcp option 82 if present (relay)
- add-or-forward : add dhcp option 82 if not present or
forward the dhcp option 82 transparently if sent by client
- enable : enable dhcp option 82 on NNI Interface(relay)
